Title: Another Fine Navy Day
Plot: The crew is hit with an attack by an unknown force unlike anything they?ve seen before. As confusion and aggression take hold, Marcus and Sam can no longer trust their own senses even as they race to save the sub and defend the island.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Gideon Emery, Omid Abtahi, David Rees Snell, Jessica Camacho, Michael Ng, Jay Hernandez
